cmp: 虫 (insect/worm, an animal/an invertebrate/a worm/an insect)
卷 (to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on, coil/to roll, chapter/examination paper)
mng: to curl up (like a scroll), to huddle, Melania libertina, wriggle (as a worm)

exm.mng: to curl up (like a scroll), to huddle, Melania libertina, wriggle (as a worm)
to curl up, to huddle, to cower, cringing
to curl up, to lie with knees drawn up, to huddle up
to curl up, to lie curled up
entering the Way, you seem to coil back (Laozi 老子, the Book of Dao 道德经, Chap. 14), progress in the Dao can seem illusory
